title: 公立學校的私人籌資 : 分層教育市場中的不平等現象

replies.msg:
This study examines inequalities of school funding as exclusively generated by the parent community in urban public schools, and potentially illuminates a secondary impact of between-school segregation. For schools that are largely understood as free, the substantial injections of private fnancing into public schools indicate a concerning tension for fairness and equity. Using a census dataset of all public schools in one Australian capital city (n=150), we compare reported parent ‘contributions, fees and charges’ and how they are patterned by measures of school disadvantage and advantage. We found a statistically signifcant relationship between private fnancing and measures of school-based advantage or disadvantage, over a four-year period. Advantaged schools generate up to six times greater income in comparison to disadvantaged schools over a four-year period, and we argue that the substantial gaps function as another form of ‘compounded disadvantage’ for residualised public schools and a tiered efect of segregation.

The Australian Educational Researcher (2020) 47:19–37
https://doi.org/10.1007/s13384-019-00328-0

https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s13384-019-00328-0

Emma Rowe, Laura B. Perry

我的結論是，任何社會的組織方法，不論是什麼主義，不論整體財富同生產力是多少，就算科技同產能再增加一千倍，人之間必定存在“地位等級”，我稱之為“prestige” ，即使今日人滿足了飽暖同淫慾，人的慾望是神奇水杯，此杯一旦被斟滿就會隨即變大，而且人生變幻莫測，危機四伏，所以人為了保障自己日後能夠持續得到資源去滿足自己，必然全部都要爭取提高自己的“prestige” ，最後prestige同資源必定會漸漸歸邊，愈來愈集中去少數上層人口身上（權貴）

在資本主義社會就像大富翁boardgames 咁以資本去歸邊，另有軍國主義，另有宗教社會，另有打獵社會，另有各式各樣的不同文明或部落

大部分下層的“低端人口”因本身資源同產能低下，極容易墮入萬劫不復之困境

而去到prestige金字塔形成的後期或末期，下層人口的自發向上爬升的力量往往會大量被抽取（分流）去上層權貴自己的爬升力（下層人口的爬升就似驢子追住綁在頭前的蘿蔔，似補風捉影），成個過程是“prestige金字塔恐慌性爬塔大賽”

因此，人類社會無utopia, 一切社會的結構只是一個生死過程，而就算重新再被建立（甚至汲取了前代社會經驗去大大修改或全面革新整個體制），也不過是loop... loop.. loop...
